title: Andy Warren
strap: I'm a self-taught Web Developer and Technologist
paragraphs: I love making things, crafting solutions across the whole tech stack. I relish the chance to solve a complex problem.

I have worked with small businesses and large groups, and I have insight into the challenges each faces when releasing digital products. I write code that is modular and testable because I know how key it is to a projects success.
I’m currently on the lookout for new and exciting opportunities and challenges. If you’re interested in hiring me then

items.text: See what I've been up to on github
